channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6400|2024-08-15T19:47:34.090Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- zenworks%20configuration%20management%20%28zcm%29
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in OpenText™ ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM) allows Unauthorized Use of Device Resources.This issue affects ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM) versions: 2020 update 3, 23.3, and 23.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-4187|2024-08-12T13:49:42.081Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- filr
item.description: Stored XSS vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ Filr product, affecting versions 24.1.1 and 24.2. The vulnerability could cause users to not be warned when clicking links to external sites.

item.title: CVE-2024-6361|2024-08-05T18:22:14.283Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- alm%20octane.
item.description: Improper Neutralization vulnerability (XSS) has been discovered in OpenText™ ALM Octane. The vulnerability affects all version prior to version 23.4. The vulnerability could cause remote code execution attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-32260|2024-08-02T15:10:24.228Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- service%20management%20automation%20x%20%28smax%29
item.description: Misinterpretation of Input vulnerability in OpenText™ Service Management Automation X (SMAX), OpenText™ Asset Management X (AMX), and OpenText™ Hybrid Cloud Management X (HCMX) products. The vulnerability could allow Input data manipulation.This issue affects Service Management Automation X (SMAX) versions: 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05; Asset Management X (AMX) versions: 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05; and Hybrid Cloud Management X (HCMX) versions: 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05.

item.title: CVE-2023-32259|2024-08-02T15:10:23.989Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- service%20management%20automation%20x%20%28smax%29
item.description: Insufficient Granularity of Access Control vulnerability in OpenText™ Service Management Automation X (SMAX), OpenText™ Asset Management X (AMX) allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects Service Management Automation X (SMAX) versions 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11; and Asset Management X (AMX) versions 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-4188|2024-08-01T20:33:52.392Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- documentum%E2%84%A2%20server
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials vulnerability in OpenText™ Documentum™ Server could allow Credential Stuffing.This issue affects Documentum™ Server: from 16.7 through 23.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-4187|2024-07-31T20:28:22.578Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- filr
item.description: Stored XSS vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ Filr product, affecting versions 24.1.1 and 24.2. The vulnerability could cause users to not be warned when clicking links to external sites.

item.title: CVE-2024-4188|2024-07-30T14:35:09.650Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- documentum%E2%84%A2%20server
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials vulnerability in OpenText™ Documentum™ Server could allow Credential Stuffing.This issue affects Documentum™ Server: from 16.7 through 23.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-38536|2024-06-04T17:28:28.837Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: HTML injection in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting version 12.5.1. The vulnerability could result in Cross site scripting.

item.title: CVE-2023-38534|2024-03-13T21:17:16.664Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.0 and 12.5.1. The vulnerability could allow disclosure of restricted information in unauthenticated RPC.

item.title: CVE-2023-38535|2024-03-13T21:17:47.507Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- exceed%20turbo%20x
item.description: Use of Hard-coded Cryptographic Key vulnerability in OpenText™ Exceed Turbo X affecting versions 12.5.1 and 12.5.2. The vulnerability could compromise the cryptographic keys.

item.title: CVE-2023-32259|2024-06-04T17:26:24.433Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- service%20management%20automation%20x%20%28smax%29
item.description: Insufficient Granularity of Access Control vulnerability in OpenText™ Service Management Automation X (SMAX), OpenText™ Asset Management X (AMX) allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects Service Management Automation X (SMAX) versions 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11; and Asset Management X (AMX) versions 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11.

item.title: CVE-2023-32260|2024-06-04T17:26:13.050Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- service%20management%20automation%20x%20%28smax%29
item.description: Misinterpretation of Input vulnerability in OpenText™ Service Management Automation X (SMAX), OpenText™ Asset Management X (AMX), and OpenText™ Hybrid Cloud Management X (HCMX) products. The vulnerability could allow Input data manipulation.This issue affects Service Management Automation X (SMAX) versions: 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05; Asset Management X (AMX) versions: 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05; and Hybrid Cloud Management X (HCMX) versions: 2020.05, 2020.08, 2020.11, 2021.02, 2021.05, 2021.08, 2021.11, 2022.05, 2022.11, 2023.05.
